items.name: Garissa Desert Explorers Maze
items.short_description: A thrilling indoor maze adventure where kids solve puzzles to find hidden treasures inspired by local wildlife and history.
items.address: Along Kismayo Road, Next to Jamia Mosque, Garissa

items.name: Tana River Quest Challenge
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor quest game set in a shaded park, simulating a journey along the Tana River with challenges and obstacles for teamwork.
items.address: Near Garissa Primary School, Bula Sheikh, Garissa

items.name: Sultan's Secret Chamber Escape
items.short_description: An escape room-style adventure where children work together to unlock the secrets of an ancient sultan's chamber within a time limit.
items.address: Mwangaza Road, Garissa Town Center, Garissa

items.name: Safari Ranger Training Course
items.short_description: A mini-obstacle course combined with nature observation challenges, teaching kids about local flora and fauna in a fun way.
items.address: Garissa Airstrip Road, Bula Punda, Garissa

items.name: Oasis Fun Park
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-theme park featuring carousels, kiddie rides, and a small water play area perfect for beating the Garissa heat.
items.address: Next to Garissa University, Garissa-Modogashe Road

items.name: Garissa Junior Wonderland
items.short_description: A delightful park with various themed play zones, including a 'mini-safari' train ride and gentle swings for younger children.
items.address: Along Jamhuri Street, Central Garissa

items.name: Sand Dune Splashland
items.short_description: A unique theme park focused on water slides, splash pads, and shallow pools designed for safe and refreshing fun under the sun.
items.address: Off Garissa-Nairobi Highway, near Kampi Samaki

items.name: Savannah Sky Funland
items.short_description: An outdoor theme park with shaded areas, offering inflatable bouncy castles, trampolines, and simple carnival games for all ages.
items.address: Bura Road, Opposite Garissa Livestock Market

items.name: Cool Kids Play Zone
items.short_description: A climate-controlled indoor center with soft play structures, ball pits, and slides, perfect for energetic children to explore.
items.address: Upstairs, Al-Amin Plaza, Posta Road, Garissa

items.name: Desert Oasis Arcade & Play
items.short_description: Combining classic arcade games with a multi-level climbing structure and toddler play section, all in a cool indoor environment.
items.address: Bula Sagal Shopping Center, Garissa-Masalani Road

items.name: Garissa Giggle House
items.short_description: A cheerful indoor play space offering creative play areas, sensory bins, and age-appropriate toys for imaginative fun.
items.address: Off Sankuri Road, near Garissa Town Clock, Garissa

items.name: Urban Jungle Gym
items.short_description: An exciting indoor facility featuring a large jungle gym, obstacle courses, and dedicated party rooms for events.
items.address: Garissa Mall, Modogashe Road, Garissa

items.name: Tana River Puppet Tales
items.short_description: A charming puppet theater showcasing traditional and modern stories with handcrafted puppets, often with local themes.
items.address: Cultural Center Hall, Bula Punda, Garissa

items.name: Garissa Desert Dreams Circus
items.short_description: A seasonal, smaller-scale circus featuring acrobats, clowns, and animal-free acts under a colorful tent on the outskirts of town.
items.address: Open grounds near Garissa Stadium, Garissa

items.name: Sultan's String & Shadow Theater
items.short_description: A unique theater combining string puppetry with mesmerizing shadow play to tell engaging folk tales and historical narratives.
items.address: Youth Empowerment Center, Sankuri Road, Garissa

items.name: Safari Sideshow Magic
items.short_description: A traveling show featuring a mix of mini-magic acts, juggling, and comedic skits performed by a small, enthusiastic troupe.
items.address: Various community halls, Garissa (check schedule)

items.name: Tana River Aquatic Life Center
items.short_description: A modest aquarium focusing on fish species found in the Tana River and other East African freshwater ecosystems, promoting local conservation.
items.address: Near Tana Bridge, Garissa-Thika Highway, Garissa

items.name: Desert Marine Exhibit (Mini)
items.short_description: A small educational exhibit showcasing hardy aquatic life that can survive in arid regions, including amphibians and invertebrates.
items.address: Garissa Museum Annex, Off Kismayo Road, Garissa

items.name: Oasis Pond Discovery
items.short_description: An interactive display featuring local pond life, demonstrating ecological principles to young visitors in an engaging way.
items.address: Within Garissa Eco-Park (planned location), Bula Punda

items.name: Reptile & Wetland Wonders
items.short_description: This center showcases fascinating reptiles and amphibians often found near water sources in the region, focusing on their unique adaptations.
items.address: Garissa Wildlife & Rescue Center, Garissa Airstrip Road

items.name: Garissa Junior Sports Hub
items.short_description: A multi-sport facility offering mini-football pitches, basketball courts, and a running track suitable for children of all ages.
items.address: Behind Garissa High School, Off Jamhuri Street

items.name: Desert Racers Go-Kart Track (Kids)
items.short_description: A safe, enclosed outdoor go-kart track specifically designed for children to experience the thrill of racing in a controlled environment.
items.address: Near Garissa Airstrip, Bula Punda, Garissa

items.name: Bula Punda Bounce & Score
items.short_description: An indoor sports center featuring trampolines, mini-volleyball courts, and soft play areas for active and playful kids.
items.address: Garissa Business Complex, Garissa-Nairobi Highway

items.name: Safari Mini-Golf Course
items.short_description: A charming 9-hole mini-golf course with safari animal-themed obstacles, perfect for family-friendly competition and laughs.
items.address: Oasis Hotel Grounds, Kismayo Road, Garissa

items.name: Garissa Dino Discovery Land
items.short_description: An outdoor park featuring life-sized, static dinosaur models amidst a natural setting, with informative plaques about the prehistoric world.
items.address: Garissa Town Park Extension, Bula Sheikh, Garissa

items.name: Mesozoic Adventure Trail
items.short_description: A walking trail with interactive displays and animatronic dinosaurs that move and roar, offering an immersive prehistoric experience.
items.address: Off Sankuri Road, near the District Hospital, Garissa

items.name: Fossil Fun Dig Site
items.short_description: A simulated fossil dig site where children can excavate dinosaur bones and learn about paleontology in a hands-on environment.
items.address: Behind Garissa University Library, Garissa-Modogashe Road

items.name: Prehistoric Playground
items.short_description: A unique playground with dinosaur-themed climbing structures, slides, and swings, designed for imaginative play and adventure.
items.address: Garissa Public Gardens, Jamhuri Street, Garissa

items.name: Desert Mirage Magic Show
items.short_description: A captivating show featuring local magicians performing illusions, card tricks, and comedic magic acts for all ages in an intimate setting.
items.address: Garissa Community Hall, Kismayo Road, Garissa

items.name: Sultan's Secret Illusions
items.short_description: An intimate theater experience where a master illusionist performs mind-bending tricks and audience participation acts.
items.address: Oasis Hotel Convention Center, Garissa

items.name: Young Wizards Academy (Workshops)
items.short_description: An interactive workshop where kids learn simple magic tricks, develop stage presence, and even perform for each other, fostering creativity.
items.address: Garissa Youth Center, Bula Punda, Garissa

items.name: Safari Sorcery & Jest
items.short_description: A family-friendly show combining magic, juggling, and comedic performances with a lighthearted safari theme.
items.address: Garissa Cultural Hall, Posta Road, Garissa

items.name: Garissa Eco-Discovery Lab
items.short_description: An interactive science center focusing on local ecosystems, water conservation, and renewable energy through hands-on exhibits.
items.address: Near Garissa University, Garissa-Modogashe Road

items.name: Star Gazer's Dome (Mini Planetarium)
items.short_description: A small dome planetarium offering shows about the night sky, constellations, and the solar system, especially relevant to clear desert skies.
items.address: Garissa Public Library Annex, Jamhuri Street

items.name: Invent & Explore Workshop
items.short_description: A creative space for children to experiment with simple machines, robotics basics, and engineering challenges.
items.address: Al-Amin Plaza, Posta Road, Garissa

items.name: Desert Wonders Science Gallery
items.short_description: A gallery featuring exhibits on the geology, wildlife, and unique adaptations of life in arid environments.
items.address: Garissa Museum, Off Kismayo Road, Garissa

items.name: Tana River Children's Farm
items.short_description: A petting zoo and educational farm where children can interact with local livestock and learn about farming practices.
items.address: Along Garissa-Hola Road, near Mororo, Garissa

items.name: Oasis Agri-Adventure
items.short_description: An interactive farm experience with pony rides, vegetable patch exploration, and opportunities to feed small animals.
items.address: Off Garissa-Nairobi Highway, near Kampi Samaki

items.name: Garissa Goat & Camel Ranch
items.short_description: A unique farm focusing on goats and camels, offering camel rides and showcasing traditional pastoralist life in the region.
items.address: Bura Road, outskirts of Garissa Town

items.name: Green Fingers Kids Garden
items.short_description: A dedicated children's garden within a larger farm, allowing kids to plant seeds, harvest vegetables, and learn about sustainable agriculture.
items.address: Near Garissa Agricultural Training Center, Modogashe Road
